snippet: If Novak Djokovic beats Rafael Nadal in the French Open final on Sunday, he will join Nadal and six others in the exclusive club of men who have won all four Grand Slam singles titles.
abstract: Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal will meet in the French Open men's final; if Djokovic triumphs, he will join Nadal and six others in the exclusive club of men who have won all four Grand Slam singles titles.
lead_paragraph: If Novak Djokovic beats Rafael Nadal in the French Open final on Sunday, he will join Nadal and six others in the exclusive club of men who have won all four Grand Slam singles titles.

headline.seo: Novak Djokovic’s First French Open Title Would Deny Rafael Nadal His Ninth
headline.main: In Paris, the Ultimate Rivalry Begins Its Next Chapter
headline.print_headline: In Paris, the Ultimate Rivalry Prepares for Its Next Chapter
